00020 char *LITM_CODE_MESSAGES[] = {
00021                 "LITM_CODE_OK",
00022                 "LITM_CODE_NO_MESSAGE",
00023                 "LITM_CODE_BUSY",
00024                 "LITM_CODE_ERROR_MALLOC",
00025                 "LITM_CODE_ERROR_CONNECTION_OPEN",
00026                 "LITM_CODE_ERROR_BAD_CONNECTION",
00027                 "LITM_CODE_ERROR_NO_MORE_CONNECTIONS",
00028                 "LITM_CODE_ERROR_INVALID_BUS",
00029                 "LITM_CODE_ERROR_SWITCH_SENDER_EQUAL_CURRENT",
00030                 "LITM_CODE_ERROR_SWITCH_NO_CURRENT",
00031                 "LITM_CODE_ERROR_SWITCH_NEXT_NOT_FOUND",
00032                 "LITM_CODE_ERROR_OUTPUT_QUEUING",
00033                 "LITM_CODE_BUSY_OUTPUT_QUEUE",
00034                 "LITM_CODE_ERROR_INVALID_ENVELOPE",
00035                 "LITM_CODE_ERROR_SUBSCRIPTION_NOT_FOUND",
00036                 "LITM_CODE_ERROR_BUS_FULL",
00037                 "LITM_CODE_BUSY_CONNECTIONS",
00038                 "LITM_CODE_ERROR_CONNECTION_NOT_ACTIVE"
00039 };
00040 
00041         litm_code
00042 litm_connect(litm_connection **conn) {
00043 
00044         switch_init();
00045 
00046         litm_code code = litm_connection_open(conn);
00047         if (LITM_CODE_OK!=code) {
00048                 *conn = NULL;
00049                 return code;
00050         }
00051 
00052         return LITM_CODE_OK;
00053 
00054 }//
00055 
00056 
00057         litm_code
00058 litm_disconnect(litm_connection *conn) {
00059 
00060         return litm_connection_close(conn);
00061 }//
00062 
00063 
00064         litm_code
00065 litm_subscribe(litm_connection *conn, litm_bus bus_id) {
00066 
00067         return switch_add_subscriber( conn, bus_id );
00068 }//
00069 
00070 
00071         litm_code
00072 litm_unsubscribe(litm_connection *conn, litm_bus bus_id) {
00073 
00074         return switch_remove_subscriber( conn, bus_id );
00075 }//
00076 
00077         litm_code
00078 litm_send(      litm_connection *conn,
00079                         litm_bus bus_id,
00080                         void *msg,
00081                         void (*cleaner)(void *msg) ) {
00082 
00083         return switch_send(conn, bus_id, msg, cleaner);
00084 }//
00085 
00086 
00087 /**
00088  * Receive (non-blocking) function for clients
00089  *
00090  * \note It is the responsibility of the client
00091  *       to _not_ use this function once a
00092  *       connection is closed.
00093  *
00094  */
00095         litm_code
00096 litm_receive_nb(litm_connection *conn, litm_envelope **envlp) {
00097 
00098         if (NULL==conn) {
00099                 return LITM_CODE_ERROR_BAD_CONNECTION;
00100         }
00101         int returnCode = LITM_CODE_OK; //optimistic
00102 
00103         *envlp = queue_get_nb( conn->input_queue );
00104         if (NULL==*envlp) {
00105                 returnCode=LITM_CODE_NO_MESSAGE;
00106         }
00107 
00108         return returnCode;
00109 }//
00110 
00111 
00112 /**
00113  * Release a message to LITM
00114  *
00115  * This function should *ONLY* be used by client's
00116  *  as a result of finishing the processing of an
00117  *  envelope/message retrieved through ``litm_receive_nb''.
00118  *
00119  */
00120         litm_code
00121 litm_release(litm_connection *conn, litm_envelope *envlp) {
00122 
00123         return switch_release( conn, envlp );
00124 }//
00125 
00126 
00127         void
00128 litm_shutdown(void) {
00129 
00130         switch_shutdown();
00131 
00132 }
00133 
00134         void *
00135 litm_get_message(litm_envelope *envlp) {
00136 
00137         if (NULL==envlp) {
00138                 return NULL;
00139         }
00140 
00141         return envlp->msg;
00142 }//
00143 
00144         char *
00145 litm_translate_code(litm_code code) {
00146 
00147         if ((sizeof(LITM_CODE_MESSAGES)/sizeof(char *)) <= code )
00148                 return NULL;
00149 
00150         return LITM_CODE_MESSAGES[code];
00151 }//
